body:
> Drop unneeded double-quoting (which we use inconsistently), use `[]` for empty arguments, space things out.

Concept ACK, obviously, as I'm using the same style :)

Why update Autoconf macros as they have no functional changes?
Mostly concept ACK. Checked (only) http://git.savannah.gnu.org/gitweb/?p=autoconf-archive.git;a=blob_plain;f=m4/ax_check_preproc_flag.m4 to see licensing changes come from upstream.

> Why update Autoconf macros as they have no functional changes?

Mostly just why not, and if we do it now, it saves someone else wanting to do it in the future. I'd think that these files will be very unlikely to be ever updated again after this.
Concept ACK, will at least check for binary identity soon.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23114](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23114) (Add minisketch subtree and integrate into build/test by fanquake)
* [#22708](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22708) ([PoC] build, qt: Add Wayland support for Linux builds with depends by hebasto)
* [#22041](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22041) (build: Make --enable-suppress-external-warnings the default by hebasto)
* [#21590](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21590) (Safegcd-based modular inverses in MuHash3072 by sipa)
* [#21515](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21515) (Erlay: bandwidth-efficient transaction relay protocol by naumenkogs)
* [#15112](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15112) (build: Optionally enable -Wzero-as-null-pointer-constant by Empact)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

> Why only the first and second arguments are quoted in AC_PATH_PROG(S) and AC_PATH_TOOL?

Updated.

> Suggesting to add more boring stuff:

Added.
